LanguageData.TM_BlissThought.stages.0.label: bliss
LanguageData.TM_BlissThought.stages.0.description: I'm in a state of wonderful, euphoric bliss.
LanguageData.MarbleMindTD.stages.0.label: mind ward
LanguageData.MarbleMindTD.stages.0.description: My mind is fortified against the troubles to come.
LanguageData.TM_TraitInfusion.stages.0.label: Absorbed traits
LanguageData.TM_TraitInfusion.stages.0.description: These changes make me feel like a stranger to myself, it's going to take some time to rediscover who I am.
LanguageData.TM_ChaoticMindTD.stages.0.label: Chaotic
LanguageData.TM_ChaoticMindTD.stages.0.description: I felt the endless possibilities of magic when I allowed my mind to be unfettered by order.
LanguageData.TM_CommanderTD.stages.0.label: Charismatic pawn
LanguageData.TM_CommanderTD.stages.0.description: I've been emotionally charged! I'm not sure what, but good things are bound to happen around such a charismatic commander.
LanguageData.TM_CommanderTD_I.stages.0.label: Charismatic commander
LanguageData.TM_CommanderTD_I.stages.0.description: I've been emotionally charged! Good things are bound to happen around such a charismatic commander, though it's not exactly clear how.
LanguageData.TM_CommanderTD_II.stages.0.label: Charismatic leader
LanguageData.TM_CommanderTD_II.stages.0.description: I've been emotionally charged! Good things are bound to happen around such a charismatic leader.
LanguageData.TM_CommanderTD_III.stages.0.label: Charismatic visionary
LanguageData.TM_CommanderTD_III.stages.0.description: I've been emotionally charged! Good things are bound to happen around such a charismatic visionary.
LanguageData.TM_TaskMasterTD.stages.0.label: Task master
LanguageData.TM_TaskMasterTD.stages.0.description: Every aspect of my life has become micro-managed; I barely have time to eat a decent meal.
LanguageData.SoulBondPhysical.stages.0.label: bliss (physical)
LanguageData.SoulBondPhysical.stages.0.description: My pain is gone. I'm floating in a sea of euphoria.
LanguageData.SoulBondMental.stages.0.label: bliss (mental)
LanguageData.SoulBondMental.stages.0.description: My worries and concerns have been washed away. Things that used to concern me are now little more than distractions that float away in a haze of dreams and reality.
LanguageData.VitalityDrainTD.stages.0.label: Vitality Drain
LanguageData.VitalityDrainTD.stages.0.description: That succubus was amazing - my worries are a dull memory and I feel relaxed, even a little lethargic.
LanguageData.TM_PositiveEmpathyTD.stages.0.label: positive vibes
LanguageData.TM_NegativeEmpathyTD.stages.0.label: negative vibes
LanguageData.TM_SuppressiveAuraTD.stages.0.label: Emotion thief
LanguageData.TM_SuppressiveAuraTD.stages.0.descriptio: I have a deep sense of sadness and loss when depriving others of their ability to feel.
LanguageData.TM_EmotionalWeightTD.stages.0.label: Emotional baggage
LanguageData.TM_EmotionalWeightTD.stages.0.descriptio: Bearing the weight of everyone's emotions.
LanguageData.TM_SymbiosisThought.stages.0.label: symbiosis
LanguageData.TM_SymbiosisThought.stages.0.description: Emotional fortitude provided by a symbiotic connection with an empath.
LanguageData.TM_OutOfBodyThought.stages.0.label: out of body
LanguageData.TM_OutOfBodyThought.stages.0.description: Emotional energy is being used to augment another pawn.
LanguageData.TM_SpiritPossessedTD.stages.0.label: possessed
LanguageData.TM_SpiritPossessedTD.stages.0.descriptio: My body is possessed by another spirit.
LanguageData.TM_SpiritDrainTD.stages.0.label: spirit drain
LanguageData.SoothingBreeze.stages.0.label: soothing breeze
LanguageData.SoothingBreeze.stages.0.description: Something is having a calming affect on me, I'm thinking clearly and I'm wasting less energy fretting about senseless concerns.
LanguageData.SoothingBreeze_I.stages.0.label: soothing breeze
LanguageData.SoothingBreeze_I.stages.0.description: Something is having a calming affect on me, I'm thinking clearly and I'm wasting less energy fretting about senseless concerns.
LanguageData.SoothingBreeze_II.stages.0.label: soothing breeze
LanguageData.SoothingBreeze_II.stages.0.description: With the wind at my back, I feel calm, relaxed, and focused and have the energy to keep going.
LanguageData.SoothingBreeze_III.stages.0.label: soothing breeze
LanguageData.SoothingBreeze_III.stages.0.description: All distractions have been washed away, I am utterly focused and have the confidence to execute all tasks to perfection.
LanguageData.RayofHope.stages.0.label: Shadow of hope
LanguageData.RayofHope_I.stages.0.label: Glimmer of hope
LanguageData.RayofHope_I.stages.0.description: I have this glimmer of hope that wasn't there before!
LanguageData.RayofHope_II.stages.0.label: Ray of hope
LanguageData.RayofHope_II.stages.0.description: Theres a ray of light breaking through this dark mood, I finally feel like we have a chance.
LanguageData.RayofHope_III.stages.0.label: Beacon of hope
LanguageData.RayofHope_III.stages.0.description: All the misfortune that's befallen us is being burned away by a brilliant light, I have a burst of energy and feel amazing!
LanguageData.AMP_I.stages.0.label: pumped
LanguageData.AMP_I.stages.0.description: I feel great. This is better than Go-Juice.
LanguageData.AMP_II.stages.0.label: amped
LanguageData.AMP_II.stages.0.description: This is amazing! I could run like the wind and fight like a lion - nothing can stop me!
LanguageData.AMP_III.stages.0.label: surging energy
LanguageData.AMP_III.stages.0.description: I'm surging with power, I feel unstoppable.
LanguageData.Shadow.stages.0.label: twitchy
LanguageData.Shadow_I.stages.0.label: anxious
LanguageData.Shadow_I.stages.0.description: There's a tingling sensation at the back of my neck, like I'm always being watched... it's creepy.
LanguageData.Shadow_II.stages.0.label: nervous
LanguageData.Shadow_II.stages.0.description: I keep seeing something out of the corner of my eye, it feels like someone is right behind me and it has me on edge.
LanguageData.Shadow_III.stages.0.label: distraught
LanguageData.Shadow_III.stages.0.description: There's another presence next to me, assisting in everything I do. It knows what to do before I do. Am I possessed?!
LanguageData.TM_Blind.stages.0.label: blinded
LanguageData.TM_Blind.stages.0.description: There was a flash of light and what it revealed to me... I can't... I don't want to see anymore!
LanguageData.TM_KilledMage_Abhorrent_Mood.stages.0.de: I killed a mage! One less abberation to worry about.
LanguageData.TM_KilledMage_Know_Abhorrent_Mood.stages: We killed a mage! Our colony will trimph over these abominations.
LanguageData.TM_MagicUse_Know_Abhorrent_Mood.stages.0: Magic was used in our colony - what a disgusting, filthy act.
LanguageData.TM_MagesInColony_Abhorrent_Mood.stages.0: Our colony is free from the abhorrent machinations of mages.
LanguageData.TM_MagesInColony_Abhorrent_Mood.stages.1: A free mage was allowed into the colony; destroy or enslave the abomination!
LanguageData.TM_MagesInColonySlave_Abhorrent_Mood.sta: We have enslaved a mage; we don't need its magic, -it- is better off dead.
LanguageData.TM_MagicUse_Disapprove_Mood.stages.0.des: We're successfully limiting the use of magic.
LanguageData.TM_MagicUse_Disapprove_Mood.stages.1.des: Too much magic is being used, this is not good for the colony.
LanguageData.TM_MagicUse_Disapprove_Mood.stages.2.des: Way too much magic is being used!
LanguageData.TM_MagicUse_Disapprove_Mood.stages.3.des: Magic is utterly dominating the environment; our ideoligion is a sham.
A tight reign is being kept on how many free mages are allowed in our colony.
There are too many free mages in the colony, this needs to be controlled quickly - make them slaves!
The number of mages in the colony is excessive and out of control; we should immediately enslave all mages to restore good order and discipline.
We've clearly failed at restricting the number of free mages in the colony.
There are now more free mages than not; what are we even trying to accomplish?
LanguageData.TM_MagicUse_Know_Approve_Mood.stages.0.d: I'm surrounded by powerful magic - our colony can surely withstand any challenge.
LanguageData.TM_MagicUse_Know_Approve_Mood.stages.1.d: I saw some magic and it was amazing!
LanguageData.TM_MagicUse_Know_Approve_Mood.stages.2.d: I haven't seen any magic recently; are my hopes misplaced?
LanguageData.TM_MagicUse_Approve_Mood.stages.0.label: magic rush
LanguageData.TM_MagicUse_Approve_Mood.stages.0.descri: magical energy is rushing through me, I feel like I could do anything!
LanguageData.TM_MagicUse_Approve_Mood.stages.1.label: magic use
LanguageData.TM_MagicUse_Approve_Mood.stages.1.descri: I used magic and it felt great.
LanguageData.TM_MagicUse_Approve_Mood.stages.2.label: magic deprevation
LanguageData.TM_MagicUse_Approve_Mood.stages.2.descri: I haven't used any magic recently; I feel out of touch with my power.
LanguageData.TM_MagesInColony_Approve_Mood.stages.0.d: The number of mages clearly demonstrates the superiority of our colony.
LanguageData.TM_MagesInColony_Approve_Mood.stages.1.d: Our colony is blessed with a large number of mages, our success is assured!
LanguageData.TM_MagesInColony_Approve_Mood.stages.2.d: The number of mages in the colony enriches many aspects of life.
LanguageData.TM_MagesInColony_Approve_Mood.stages.3.d: We have several mages in the colony who will guide us in the ways of magic.
LanguageData.TM_MagesInColony_Approve_Mood.stages.4.d: How can we rely on magic if we don't have a mage in the colony?
LanguageData.TM_IsMage_Approve_Social.stages.0.label: mage
LanguageData.TM_IsMage_Approve_Social.stages.1.label: mage kinship
LanguageData.TM_IsMage_Approve_Social.stages.2.label: non-mage
LanguageData.TM_KilledMage_Venerated_Mood.stages.0.de: I killed a being blessed with magic... how can I live with myself?
LanguageData.TM_KilledMage_Venerated_Mood.stages.1.de: I was forced to slay another mage and it weighs heavily on my conscience.
LanguageData.TM_KilledMage_Know_Venerated_Mood.stages: We killed a mage; this goes against our prime ideoligion!
LanguageData.TM_MagicUse_Know_Venerated_Mood.stages.0: I'm in awe and terror by the power of magic!
LanguageData.TM_MagicUse_Know_Venerated_Mood.stages.2: I haven't seen any magic recently; its absence leaves me hollow.
LanguageData.TM_MagicUse_Venerated_Mood.stages.0.desc: magical energy is rushing through me, I feel like I could do anything!
LanguageData.TM_MagicUse_Venerated_Mood.stages.1.desc: I used magic; it's a core part of my being and reaffirms confidence in my superiority.
LanguageData.TM_MagicUse_Venerated_Mood.stages.2.desc: I haven't used any magic recently; I feel out of touch with my power.
LanguageData.TM_MagesInColony_Venerated_Mood.stages.0: The success of our colony is assured through the power of magic.
LanguageData.TM_MagesInColony_Venerated_Mood.stages.1: Our colony is surely chosen for greatness while graced with this many mages; their combined power is indomitable.
LanguageData.TM_MagesInColony_Venerated_Mood.stages.2: Like a tapestry, the number of mages in the colony has begun to reveal a grand design.
LanguageData.TM_MagesInColony_Venerated_Mood.stages.3: Mages in our colony will guide us in our chosen path.
LanguageData.TM_MagesPrisoner_Venerated_Mood.stages.0: We've emprisoned a mage, are we sure our actions are justified?
LanguageData.TM_MagesSlave_Venerated_Mood.stages.0.de: We've enslaved a mage, what a despicable act.
LanguageData.TM_Botched_SeverMagicTD.stages.0.label: botched severence ritual
LanguageData.TM_Botched_SeverMagicTD.stages.0.descrip: The severence ritual was botched and gave the mage a chance to retaliate.
LanguageData.TM_Lethal_SeverMagicTD.stages.0.label: lethal severence ritual
LanguageData.TM_Lethal_SeverMagicTD.stages.0.descript: That ritual lacked order and the technique was terrible, killing the mage.
LanguageData.TM_Success_SeverMagicTD.stages.0.label: successful severence ritual
LanguageData.TM_Success_SeverMagicTD.stages.0.descrip: The severence ritual was a success, freeing us from the oppression of another mage.
LanguageData.TM_Flawless_SeverMagicTD.stages.0.label: flawless severence ritual
LanguageData.TM_Flawless_SeverMagicTD.stages.0.descri: The chorus of voices, the intensity of the voidbringer, the look of inevitability on the face of the mage - nothing can stop our crusade!
LanguageData.TM_MagicSeverenceTD.stages.0.label: Severed from magic
LanguageData.TM_MagicSeverenceTD.stages.0.description: I've lost something that once defined who I was; I feel a mix of dispair and emptiness.
LanguageData.TM_SeverMagic_ForApproveTD.stages.0.desc: A ritual to sever the magic from a mage was performed in our colony; what a despicable and barbaric act.
LanguageData.TM_SeverMagic_ForVeneratedTD.stages.0.de: A ritual to sever the magic from a mage was performed in our colony; this henious act of barbarism is an afront to everything we believe.
LanguageData.TM_Botched_BestowMagicTD.stages.0.label: botched gifting ritual
LanguageData.TM_Botched_BestowMagicTD.stages.0.descri: The gifting ritual was botched and no magical spark was granted.
LanguageData.TM_Success_BestowMagicTD.stages.0.label: successful gifting ritual
LanguageData.TM_Success_BestowMagicTD.stages.0.descri: The gifting ritual successfully bestowed the magical spark.
LanguageData.TM_Flawless_BestowMagicTD.stages.0.label: enlightened gifting ritual
LanguageData.TM_Flawless_BestowMagicTD.stages.0.descr: It was as if the heavens opened up to bless the ritual and a chorus of voices sang the glory of our cause!
LanguageData.TM_Poor_BestowMagicClassTD.stages.0.desc: The ritual guiding a mage towards their arcane path was bland and uninteresting.
The arcane path selection ritual was encouraging and interesting.
LanguageData.TM_Good_BestowMagicClassTD.stages.0.desc: The arcane path ritual was fantastic, emotionally and magically charged - it's always wonderful to see someone achieve their dreams!
LanguageData.TM_MagicLoreTD.stages.0.label: gained arcane knowledge
LanguageData.TM_MagicLoreTD.stages.0.description: I've been enlightened by words from a powerful mage, now I just have to apply this knowledge...
LanguageData.TM_MightLoreTD.stages.0.label: gained combat experience
LanguageData.TM_MightLoreTD.stages.0.description: A more experienced fighter has taught me how to improve my combat techniques.
LanguageData.TM_EntertainedTD.stages.0.label: entertained
LanguageData.TM_EntertainedTD.stages.0.description: This place isn't so bad; there are people here that make me forget about my worries and laugh a little.
LanguageData.TM_EntertainedAuraTD.stages.0.label: social entertainment
LanguageData.TM_EntertainedAuraTD.stages.0.descriptio: I had a really fun time talking with others.
LanguageData.TM_EntertainerAuraTD.stages.0.label: social interaction
LanguageData.TM_EntertainerAuraTD.stages.0.descriptio: I really like interacting with the people around here, it makes me happy to bring a little joy to others.
LanguageData.TM_NeedTravel.stages.0.label: trapped
LanguageData.TM_NeedTravel.stages.0.description: I've been stuck at this place forever. I need to get away from here and see the world!
LanguageData.TM_NeedTravel.stages.1.label: adventuring
LanguageData.TM_NeedTravel.stages.1.description: Nothing beats being on the road and seeing new places.
LanguageData.TM_MinionAlways.stages.0.label: freed from pitboss
LanguageData.TM_MinionAlways.stages.0.description: Finally free of my harsh taskmaster... now to relax a little.
LanguageData.ManaPotionHigh.stages.0.label: mana surge
LanguageData.ManaPotionHigh.stages.0.description: This power... it's overwhelming. I feel the power of the cosmos at my fingertips, but it's turning my bones to ash.
LanguageData.ManaPotionWithdrawal.stages.1.label: mana withdrawal
LanguageData.ManaPotionWithdrawal.stages.1.descriptio: Ugh... everything is a blur. I can't seem to focus or control my body, I feel separated from reality. I need to feel mana flowing into my soul.
LanguageData.TM_PomanaSenseTD.stages.0.label: pomana sense
LanguageData.TM_PomanaSenseTD.stages.0.description: My mind is relaxed and my thoughts are clear, I feel more aware and content with my place in the universe.
LanguageData.TM_SyrriumSenseTD.stages.0.label: syrrium sense
LanguageData.TM_SyrriumSenseTD.stages.0.description: My mind is relaxed and answers seem to flow to me as if I'm attuned to the universe.
LanguageData.TM_SyrriumWithdrawalTD.stages.1.label: syrrium withdrawal
LanguageData.TM_SyrriumWithdrawalTD.stages.1.descript: My mind feels muddled. With syrrium I was brilliant, I'm sure everyone was impressed with my intellect. That's who I am, I need to have that!
LanguageData.TM_TakingOrdersTD.stages.0.label: taking orders
LanguageData.TM_TakingOrdersTD.stages.0.description: Another pawn gave me orders. This could become annoying.
LanguageData.RangerSoldBondedPet.stages.0.label: sold bonded animal
LanguageData.RangerSoldBondedPet.stages.0.description: I allowed my animal companion to be sold into slavery. I won't soon be forgiven by the animal kingdom. (animal bonding disabled while this mood effect is active)
LanguageData.RangerPetDied.stages.0.label: bonded animal died
LanguageData.RangerPetDied.stages.0.description: My faithful animal companion died. It feels like I've lost a piece of myself.
LanguageData.Polymorphed.stages.0.label: polymorphed against will
LanguageData.Polymorphed.stages.0.description: I was polymorphed and forced to exist in the body of an animal, how dehumanizing.
LanguageData.Polymorphed_Transhumanist.stages.0.label: polymorphed!
LanguageData.Polymorphed_Transhumanist.stages.0.descr: I was polymorphed into a wild animal - and it was AMAZING!.
LanguageData.WarlockEmpathy.stages.0.label: Empathy
LanguageData.WarlockEmpathy.stages.0.description: I can feel the emotions of those around me.
LanguageData.PsychicEmpathy.stages.0.label: Empathy
LanguageData.PsychicEmpathy.stages.0.description: I can't explain why I'm feeling these strong emotions.
LanguageData.TM_MemoryWipe.stages.0.label: clean slate
LanguageData.TM_MemoryWipe.stages.0.description: I can't remember the last few days, maybe that is for the best.
LanguageData.AteMysteryMeatDirect.stages.0.label: ate minion meat
LanguageData.AteMysteryMeatDirect.stages.0.descriptio: I ate some disgusting mystery meat from a dead minion. It was mashed together with sludge and other decaying things I couldn't identify. Was that a fingernail? Gross.
LanguageData.AteMysteryMeatAsIngredient.stages.0.desc: I ate a meal cooked with minion meat. No amount of seasoning or spices could prevent the impression that I was eating something disgusting.
LanguageData.TM_PhantomLimb.stages.0.label: phantom limb
LanguageData.TM_PhantomLimb.stages.0.description: Are these body parts really mine? I feel like a guest in my own body.
LanguageData.TM_PleasantDreamsTD.stages.0.label: pleasant dreams
LanguageData.TM_PleasantDreamsTD.stages.0.description: My dreams are filled with memories and events that make me happy.
LanguageData.TM_BrightDayTD.stages.0.label: brightened day
LanguageData.TM_BrightDayTD.stages.0.description: A Spirit of Light brightened my day.
LanguageData.TM_Undead.stages.0.label: undead
LanguageData.TM_Necromancer.stages.0.label: necromancer
LanguageData.TM_OpinionOfBoundless.stages.0.label: boundless arrogance
LanguageData.TM_Lich.stages.0.label: lich
LanguageData.TM_HolierThanThou.stages.0.label: Self-righteous mage
LanguageData.TM_FemaleOpinionOfSuccubus.stages.0.desc: Everyone pays attention to her because of her looks, doesn't anything else matter?
LanguageData.TM_FemaleOpinionOfSuccubus.stages.1.desc: She has an air of attraction that I'll never have... and I hate her for it.
LanguageData.TM_MaleOpinionOfSuccubus.stages.0.label: Illusion of beauty
LanguageData.TM_MaleOpinionOfSuccubus.stages.0.descri: Experience in the arts of combat reveal the lie in her form and movement, but sometimes it's easier to just accept the deception
LanguageData.TM_MaleOpinionOfSuccubus.stages.1.label: Devilishly attractive
LanguageData.TM_MaleOpinionOfSuccubus.stages.1.descri: I can tell she uses demonic powers to make herself more attractive, but that knowledge does little to diminish the effect
LanguageData.TM_MaleOpinionOfSuccubus.stages.2.label: Alluring
LanguageData.TM_MaleOpinionOfSuccubus.stages.2.descri: There's something about her that is undeniably and overwhelmingly attractive
LanguageData.Thought_EnchantedAura.stages.0.label: charming
LanguageData.Thought_EnchantedAura.stages.1.label: enchanting
LanguageData.Thought_EnchantedAura.stages.2.label: powerful allure
LanguageData.Thought_EnchantedAura.stages.3.label: positively glamorous
LanguageData.Thought_EnchantedBody.stages.0.label: third arm
LanguageData.Thought_EnchantedBody.stages.0.descripti: Has a third arm... it's uncomfortable to look at and unnatural.
LanguageData.Thought_EnchantedBody.stages.1.label: four arms
LanguageData.Thought_EnchantedBody.stages.1.descripti: I don't care if those extra arms are magical, it's freakish.
LanguageData.Thought_EnchantedBody.stages.2.label: strange growth
LanguageData.Thought_EnchantedBody.stages.2.descripti: It goes beyond reason to simply start sprouting extra body parts; it seems like that third eye is always staring at me.
LanguageData.Thought_EnchantedBody.stages.3.label: mutant
LanguageData.Thought_EnchantedBody.stages.3.descripti: What's next, another head? This has gone too far.
LanguageData.Thought_EnchantedBody.stages.4.label: admiring transhumanist
LanguageData.Thought_EnchantedBody.stages.4.descripti: To be able to morph yourself into whatever you wish - what an amazing ability!
LanguageData.Thought_EnchantedBody.stages.5.label: hateful body purist
LanguageData.Thought_EnchantedBody.stages.5.descripti: What a freak, I think -it- is gross.
LanguageData.Thought_ObservedUndead.stages.0.label: observed undead
LanguageData.Thought_ObservedUndead.stages.0.descript: I hate being next to the undead. I can't help but think... will that happen to me when I die?
LanguageData.Thought_WearingDemonhide.stages.0.label: demonhide {0}
LanguageData.Thought_WearingDemonhide.stages.0.descri: Wearing apparel made with demonhide makes me feel more confident.
LanguageData.Thought_WearingDemonhide.stages.1.label: demonhide {0} (+1)
LanguageData.Thought_WearingDemonhide.stages.1.descri: Demonhide clothing is a symbol of my elite status.
LanguageData.Thought_WearingDemonhide.stages.2.label: demonhide {0} (+2)
LanguageData.Thought_WearingDemonhide.stages.2.descri: I'm clothed in the hide of a demon; my status and safety is guaranteed.
LanguageData.TM_HealingRainTD.stages.0.label: healing rain
LanguageData.TM_HealingRainTD.stages.0.description: My pain is being washed away.
